homePage.title: Learn English the Easy Way | Merrill English
homePage.heroText: Learn English the easy way with Merrill English.

homecard-1.title: 1-on-1 Classes
homecard-1.text: Benefit from individualized lessons tailored to your language learning needs.

homecard-2.title: Small Class Sizes
homecard-2.text: Classes consist of twenty students or less to give our students the chance to engage without being left behind.

homecard-3.title: Native English Speakers
homecard-3.text: All Merrill English teachers are trained to professional standards and are true native level English speakers.

feature-1.title: Keep learning wherever you go.
feature-1.feature: With the Merrill English learning platform, you can participate in classes from all your devices . Just log in to join group classes and 1-on-1 sessions with ease!

feature-2.title: Learn at your own pace.
feature-2.feature: We offer English courses for students of all levels and lifestyles. No matter how busy you are, our interactive English courses can fit into any schedule.

callToAction.title: Get started today.
callToAction.cta: Sign up to start your risk-free 7-day trial

howItWorksPage.title: How to Learn English Online | Merrill English

homecard-1.title: Conversational Practice
homecard-1.text: Build your English skills by practicing with native speakers every class.

homecard-2.title: Feedback made just for you
homecard-2.text: Get monthly progress reports from your teachers so you know the material you have mastered as well as where you need more practice.

homecard-3.title: Learn American English
homecard-3.text: Learn the dialect of English spoken by more than 331 milion people around the world.
